question: Create a JavaScript function that takes an array of HTML color names or HEX codes and returns a sorted array by the luminance of the colors from darkest to lightest. Use the standard RGB luminance formula and assume that all HEX codes will be in full form, i.e., 6 characters long.
rules: Assume standard CSS color names are used.
All HEX codes are 6 characters long.
Calculate luminance based on the standard RGB luminance formula.
